name: One Small Step (Liam de Valmency)
description:
Do you have what it takes to earn the coveted title of... Good Tripod?
The big Invasion is looming and oh no you can barely walk?!?!
You'd better get training! You just have to move your legs and go forward and not fall over and get to the finish line and celebrate.

Controls:

Q / W / E : Upper legs
A / S / D: Lower legs
Shift (hold): Contract legs
Arrow keys: Rotate camera

Note:

This game was written in a weekend and is based on some bogus-as-heck physics, so don't panic if things get a bit shaky.

Also: the Mac and Linux builds are untested. Good luck, Tripod.

Credits:

Made in 2 days for the "Other Worlds" game jam in Guildford. Won the jam award for humour.

Liam de Valmency: Design/Code
Lewis Thompson: Sound effects
Holley Gray: Music
